name: The Door (itch) (Alise_K)
description:
You see the door in front of you. But you cannot open it. Moreover, even the possibility of opening this door scares you. You do not have a key, there are only many variations of opening this door. But after every door there will be another door.

The game puts you in an abstract space. This space is your consciousness. A lot of the paths you use to get out of here are the scenarios that you rehearse in your head. Trying to predict what awaits you in the future, you find yourself in the endless cycle of events and options for the development of the plot.

                                                                                                                                                        

WASD — move

F — interact
